coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: A marking discreetly engraved into the sword's handle informs you that it was made by 'C4MG1RL'.
coreAttributes.name: Muramasa
coreAttributes.description: One of the youko's legendary cursed swords, Muramasa has been masterfully crafted to house and channel the wielder's arcane power. It faintly crackles and hums with arcane power, even when sheathed, almost as though it can't wait to cut down its next foe...
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] Muramasa at [npc.her] hip, so that [npc.she] may draw it at a moment's notice.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] Muramasa at [npc2.name], grinning as the ethereal arcane blade travels through [npc2.her] body!
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Muramasa, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the ethereal blade travel straight through [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Muramasa, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the ethereal blade passes right through [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Muramasa, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Muramasa, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
